field.name: body_html
field.div: % set hold = object.get_objects() % set owner = object.partner_id.firstname % set child_code = hold.child_id.local_id % set child_name = hold.child_id.name
field.p:
Dear ${owner},
We just learned that the child ${child_name} with ref. ${child_code} is no longer available for sponsorship. The following comments were received : ${hold.comments}
If you have the childpack, please don't use it.
Yours sincerely

record.field: ${object.partner_id and object.partner_id.email and object.partner_id.id or False }

field.name: body_html
field.div: % set partner = object.partner_id % set child = object.get_objects() % set firstname = child.get_list('firstname', 3, 'many children')
field.p:
${partner.salutation},
A warm thank you for supporting ${firstname}. Compassion Switzerland is delighted to send you a new photo of your sponsored child. You will see how ${child.get('he') + ' ' + child.get('has')} grown! % if object.send_mode == 'both':
We will send you the printed picture as we used to do in the following weeks. In case you don't need it, or you want to stop receiving pictures by e-mail, please let us know by answering to this e-mail. % endif
Thanks to your generosity, the Compassion staff offer a stable environment, support and different activities. ${child.get('your sponsored child').capitalize()} can develop on a personal, educational, spiritual and medical level. Through your sponsorship, you also allow ${child.get('him')} to have a special relationship with somebody living on the other side of the world. % if object.send_mode == 'physical': Enclosed, you will find writing paper which will enable you to write to ${child.get('your sponsored child')} and to send a new photo of yourself. % endif Thank you very much for your commitment to Compassion to release children from poverty in Jesusâ€™ name.
Yours sincerely
